sections.heading: Definitions
sections.text: 22.03 Definitions.—Unless otherwise clearly required by the context, as used in ss. 22.01-22.10:

sections.heading: Enabling authority for emergency interim successors for local offices.
sections.text: authority for emergency interim successors for local offices.

sections.heading: Emergency interim successors for local officers.
Period in which authority may be exercised.
sections.text: in which authority may be exercised.

sections.heading: Disputes
sections.text: 22.10 Disputes.—Any dispute concerning a question of fact arising under ss. 22.01-22.09 with respect to an office in the executive branch of the state government (except a dispute of fact relative to the office of Governor) shall be adjudicated by the Governor (or other official authorized under the constitution or ss. 22.01-22.09 to exercise the powers and discharge the duties of the office of Governor) and his or her decision shall be final.

sections.heading: Seat of government; emergency temporary location.
Emergency continuity of government; political subdivision.
22.01-22.10 shall be known and may be cited as the “Emergency Interim Executive and Judicial Succession Act.”
sections.text: 22.01-22.10 shall be known and may be cited as the “Emergency Interim Executive and Judicial Succession Act.”
